com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter

Class LargeValueFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter.LargeValueFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueFormatter, YAxisValueFormatter

    public class LargeValueFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueFormatter, YAxisValueFormatter
    Predefined value-formatter that formats large numbers in a pretty way. Outputs: 856 = 856; 1000 = 1k; 5821 = 5.8k; 10500 = 10k; 101800 = 102k; 2000000 = 2m; 7800000 = 7.8m; 92150000 = 92m; 123200000 = 123m; 9999999 = 10m; 1000000000 = 1b; Special thanks to Roman Gromov (https://github.com/romangromov) for this piece of code.
    Author:
    Philipp Jahoda, Oleksandr Tyshkovets

    • Method Detail

      • getFormattedValue

        public java.lang.String getFormattedValue(float value,
                                          Entry entry,
                                          int dataSetIndex,
                                          ViewPortHandler viewPortHandler)
        Description copied from interface: ValueFormatter
        Called when a value (from labels inside the chart) is formatted before being drawn. For performance reasons, avoid excessive calculations and memory allocations inside this method.
        Specified by:
        getFormattedValue in interface ValueFormatter
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be formatted
        entry - the entry the value belongs to - in e.g. BarChart, this is of class BarEntry
        dataSetIndex - the index of the DataSet the entry in focus belongs to
        viewPortHandler - provides information about the current chart state (scale, translation, ...)
        Returns:
        the formatted label ready for being drawn

        Description copied from interface: YAxisValueFormatter
        Called when a value from the YAxis is formatted before being drawn. For performance reasons, avoid excessive calculations and memory allocations inside this method.
        Specified by:
        getFormattedValue in interface YAxisValueFormatter
        Parameters:
        value - the YAxis value to be formatted
        yAxis - the YAxis object the value belongs to

      • setSuffix

        public void setSuffix(java.lang.String[] suff)
        Set custom suffix to be appended after the values. Default suffix: ["", "k", "m", "b", "t"]
        Parameters:
        suff - new suffix
